p: Annual vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza infections. In 2003 the World Health Organization (WHO) recommended a 75% vaccination coverage rate (VCR) for the older age groups, although by 2010, this objective has not been reached yet in Spain. Specifically, VCR in ≥65-year-old population was 55.7% in the 2017–2018 season [ 16]. Even more, VCR of healthcare professionals, considered as a group with higher risk for spreading the disease, was only 31% [ 17].
